description.p: Returns the smallest integer that is greater than or equal to Number.
Returns the smallest integer great than or equal to the number.

discussion.p: The Ceiling function returns the smallest integer great than or equal to the number.

example.caption: Ceiling() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 ceiling(23.4) AS EXPR1, ceiling(-13.2) AS EXPR2 FROM Products = 24|-13
